name: MazeMachine
description:
Description
Try to collect all 4 artefacts to win the game.
Every time you change your move direction the maze will change.
Avoid the skeleton.

Controls
WASD: move

Credits
Programmer: fixxiefixx, funkadelician
Sounds: rafaelespindola
Music: fixxiefixx
3D models: fixxiefixx
Textures: fixxiefixx
Metal textures by knittel and radiatoryang from opengameart.org
